-----Original Message-----
From: Almajma [mailto:almajma@islamicacademy.org] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 18, 2005 9:01 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: legal@theplanet.com; 'Copyright Compliance'
Subject: RE: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Reporting Abuse and Fraud]

Hello,

All we want is to get your client use the images as is or remove them and
stop copying material in such manner from other sites. It's a request from
you company to force your client manage his site according to international
laws. I think that's one of the documents all of us sign before we get on
board with hosts.

Thanks.

M. Tahir Shafi Qaderi.

Hello,



Before we proceed with legal action agains you and www.ahadees.com
<http://www.ahadees.com/> which is residing on your servers we want to give
you a chance to address this issue.



This site's owner has a habit of taking material from our site and removing
our logos off the material and posting them on www.ahadees.com
<http://www.ahadees.com/>  In the past he had posted many aritlces from our
site which already had our stamps on them and posted them on his site after
removing our stamps from them. It took us several months to convince him to
remove those materials.



Now he has taken our Copyrighted Graphic images which have been created by
our team and posted them on his site www.ahadees.com
<http://www.ahadees.com/> after removing the stamps from them. We have been
fare enough to offer him to keep the images on his site but without any
alterations and have send him many emails but have not received any
response.



We are ready to take legal action towards this site and the owner of this
site Mr. Syed Muhammad Fahad Akhtar. If no action has been taken from your
end on this issue your company would be added to the law suit since this
site resides on your server. We want to resolve this issue peacefully and
don't want to proceed with the law suit if the defendant removes images from
the site or use them as is. But if this issue has not been resolved by him
Or you within seven days we would be forced to proceed with legal action.



Following are the links of the pages:



Our page which has the originals:

http://www.islamicacademy.org/html/Islamic%20Images/Islamic%20Images.htm



Ahadees.com's page with altered images:

http://www.ahadees.com/galleries/





Regards.


Mohammad Tahir Shafi Qaderi
